nodes.text: Zaddja was a terrestrial astronomical object located in the Zaddja system of the Outer Rim Territories, situated at the coordinates H-15 on the Standard Galactic Grid. Its surface consisted of oceans broken up by archipelagoes of white sand beaches. At night, the beaches were covered by water from the high tides; as such, the inhabitants of Zaddja lived on flying skiffs. A hyperspace route connected Zaddja to Gannaria, a planet in the Trilon sector.

The author and historian Eloc Throno wrote about the astronomical object in his book Traveler's Guide to Batuu, in which Zaddja was listed as a locale that could be reached with a short flight from the planet Batuu.

Zaddja was first mentioned in the Star Wars: The Force Awakens Beginner Game, published by Fantasy Flight Games in 2016. In the Star Wars Legends continuity, Zaddja first appeared in the comic Crimson Empire 1, written by Mike Richardson and Randy Stradley, penciled by Paul Gulacy, and published on December 7, 1997.
